attributes.action: Investigate Israeli Embassies meddling and influence over UK Government activity
attributes.additional_details:
Aljazeera investigation "The Lobby"

SNP Alex Salmond: “It is completely unacceptable for the UK government to declare the matter closed.”
attributes.background:
Shai Masot plotting against UK Gov. 
The Israeli diplomatic mission to the UK implicated in number of other activities designed to influence policymakers both now and in the future
